basic usage
```sh
Rscript run_seeker.R <study>.yml <parentDir>
```

fancier, works for both bash and zsh
```sh
study="GSE143524" && \
parentDir="/Users/jakehughey/Downloads" && \
mkdir -p "${parentDir}/${study}" && \
Rscript inst/extdata/run_seeker.R data-raw/${study}.yml "${parentDir}" &> \
"${parentDir}/${study}/progress.log"
```
